data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Williams, Kevin A., Brothers, Denis J., Pitts, James P. (2011): New species of Tobantilla Casal, 1965 and a new genus and species, Gogoltilla chichikovi gen. et sp. nov., from Argentina (Hymenoptera: Mutillidae). Zootaxa 3064: 41-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278958
